includedAssets.title: It Takes a Village
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep1 - It Takes a Village
includedAssets.synopsis: The crime drama embarks on its seventh outing, finding the team at a crossroads after being questioned about Prentiss' disappearance and assumed death.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The crime drama embarks on its seventh outing, finding the team at a crossroads after being questioned about Prentiss' disappearance and assumed death
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The crime drama embarks on its seventh outing, finding the team at a crossroads after being questioned about Prentiss' disappearance and assumed death.

includedAssets.title: Proof
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU team head to rural Oklahoma when women are found murdered and robbed of one of their five senses. Meanwhile, JJ and Prentiss get the cold shoulder from Reid.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU team head to rural Oklahoma when women are found murdered and robbed of one of their five senses.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU team head to rural Oklahoma when women are found murdered and robbed of one of their five senses. Meanwhile, JJ and Prentiss get the cold shoulder from Reid.

includedAssets.title: Dorado Falls
includedAssets.synopsis: The team investigate a mass murder at an internet security company, while Prentiss must complete recertification training under Morgan's supervision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team investigate a mass murder at an internet security company, while Prentiss must complete recertification training under Morgan's supervision.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team investigate a mass murder at an internet security company, while Prentiss must complete recertification training under Morgan's supervision.

includedAssets.title: Painless
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU team deal with a case of déjà vu when survivors of a high school massacre are targeted by a new murderer with a similar killing style.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU team deal with a case of déjà vu when survivors of a high school massacre are targeted by a new murderer with a similar killing style.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU team deal with a case of déjà vu when survivors of a high school massacre are targeted by a new murderer with a similar killing style.

includedAssets.title: From Childhood's Hour
includedAssets.synopsis: Rossi reconnects with his first wife, Carolyn (Isabelle Hoffman), who has shocking news to share, while the team investigate a series of abductions.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rossi reconnects with his first wife, Carolyn (Isabelle Hoffman), who has shocking news to share, while the team investigate a series of abductions.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rossi reconnects with his first wife, Carolyn (Isabelle Hoffman), who has shocking news to share, while the team investigate a series of abductions.

includedAssets.title: Epilogue
includedAssets.synopsis: The team investigates when a number of bodies are discovered in the Angeles National Forest in California. Meanwhile, Rossi struggles with a personal decision.

includedAssets.title: There's No Place Like Home
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep7 - There's No Place Like Home
includedAssets.synopsis: The team head to Wichita to investigate a number of deaths in the aftermath of a storm. Meanwhile, work pressures cause problems for JJ at home.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team head to Wichita to investigate a number of deaths in the aftermath of a storm. Meanwhile, work pressures cause problems for JJ at home.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team head to Wichita to investigate a number of deaths in the aftermath of a storm. Meanwhile, work pressures cause problems for JJ at home.

includedAssets.title: Hope
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU investigate when Monica, a friend of Garcia's from her survivors' support group, vanishes on the seventh anniversary of her daughter's disappearance.

includedAssets.title: Self-Fulfilling Prophecy
includedAssets.synopsis: The team investigates the real reason behind an apparent mass suicide of a small group of youths at a military academy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team investigates the real reason behind an apparent mass suicide of a small group of youths at a military academy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team investigates the real reason behind an apparent mass suicide of a small group of youths at a military academy.

includedAssets.title: The Bittersweet Science
includedAssets.synopsis: When the BAU team investigate a string of brutal bludgeonings in Philadelphia, the search for the killer leads them to the city's boxing scene.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When the BAU team investigate a string of brutal bludgeonings in Philadelphia, the search for the killer leads them to the city's boxing scene.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When the BAU team investigate a string of brutal bludgeonings in Philadelphia, the search for the killer leads them to the city's boxing scene.

includedAssets.title: True Genius
includedAssets.synopsis: The team investigate a series of murders bearing the telltale signs of the infamous Zodiac Killer. Bestselling crime novelist Patricia Cornwell guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team investigate a series of murders bearing the telltale signs of the infamous Zodiac Killer. Bestselling crime novelist Patricia Cornwell guest
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team investigate a series of murders bearing the telltale signs of the infamous Zodiac Killer. Bestselling crime novelist Patricia Cornwell guest stars.

includedAssets.title: Unknown Subject
includedAssets.synopsis: The landmark 150th episode of the popular crime drama sees the BAU team travel to Houston to search for a serial rapist who is assaulting his past victims.

includedAssets.title: Snake Eyes
includedAssets.synopsis: The team head to Atlantic City to investigate a series of casino-related murders, where they encounter unlucky gambler Curtis Banks (guest star Dean Cain).

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team head to Atlantic City to investigate a series of casino-related murders, where they encounter unlucky gambler Curtis Banks (guest star Dean Cain).

includedAssets.title: Closing Time
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU head to the choppy waters of Southern California when a series of bodies are discovered hidden in lifeguard towers along the coast.

includedAssets.title: A Thin Line
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU investigate a series of brutal home invasions and murders in suburbs across California, uncovering a disturbingly sinister motive along the way.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU investigate a series of home invasions and murders across California, uncovering a disturbingly sinister motive along the way.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU investigate a series of brutal home invasions and murders in suburbs across California, uncovering a disturbingly sinister motive along the way.

includedAssets.title: A Family Affair
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU head to Atlanta to investigate a series of murders in which all the victims are women and they soon discover there could be more than one killer.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: BAU head to Atlanta to investigate a series of murders in which all the victims are women and they soon discover there could be more than one killer.

includedAssets.title: I Love You, Tommy Brown
includedAssets.altTitle: S7, Ep17 - I Love You, Tommy Brown
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU head to Seattle to investigate a particularly heartrending series of murders, where all the victims were foster parents to young children.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU head to Seattle to investigate a particularly heartrending series of murders, where all the victims were foster parents to young children.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU head to Seattle to investigate a particularly heartrending series of murders, where all the victims were foster parents to young children.

includedAssets.title: Foundation
includedAssets.synopsis: Morgan must revisit his own traumatic past when a young boy is found scared and alone in the desert, and another is reported missing. Is a kidnapper to blame?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Morgan must revisit his own traumatic past when a young boy is found scared and alone in the desert, and another is reported missing.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Morgan must revisit his own traumatic past when a young boy is found scared and alone in the desert, and another is reported missing. Is a kidnapper to blame?

includedAssets.title: Heathridge Manor
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU investigates a series of gothic ritualistic murders in Oregon. Matthew Gray Gubler (Reid) directs and Robert 'Freddy Krueger' Englund guest stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU investigates a series of gothic ritualistic murders in Oregon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU investigates a series of gothic ritualistic murders in Oregon. Matthew Gray Gubler (Reid) directs and Robert 'Freddy Krueger' Englund guest stars.

includedAssets.title: The Company
includedAssets.synopsis: Morgan is forced to confront a lie he told his family when the case into the disappearance of his cousin is reopened by the BAU following a possible sighting.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Morgan is forced to confront a lie he told is family when the case into his cousin's disappearance is reopened following a possible sighting.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Morgan is forced to confront a lie he told his family when the case into the disappearance of his cousin is reopened by the BAU following a possible sighting.

includedAssets.title: Divining Rod
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU must act quickly when a notorious serial killer is executed and a copycat begins murdering women in the same fashion in the same Oklahoma town.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU must act quickly when a serial killer is executed and a copycat begins killing in the same fashion in the same Oklahoma town.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU must act quickly when a notorious serial killer is executed and a copycat begins murdering women in the same fashion in the same Oklahoma town.

includedAssets.title: Profiling 101
includedAssets.synopsis: Rossi and the team present one of their longest-running open serial murder investigations to a group of college students.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rossi and the team present one of their longest-running open serial murder investigations to a group of college students.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rossi and the team present one of their longest-running open serial murder investigations to a group of college students.

includedAssets.title: Hit
includedAssets.synopsis: In the first of a two-part season finale, the BAU goes up against a gang of bank robbing serial killers. The stakes are raised when one of their own is taken hostage.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the first of a two-part season finale, the BAU takes on bank robbing serial killers. The stakes are raised when one of their own is taken hostage.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the first of a two-part season finale, the BAU goes up against a gang of bank robbing serial killers. The stakes are raised when one of their own is taken hostage.

includedAssets.title: Run
includedAssets.synopsis: As the BAU continues to negotiate with the serial-killing bank robbers, one of the team gets married and Prentiss ponders her future. An explosive season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season finale. As the BAU continues to negotiate with the serial-killing bank robbers, one of the team gets married and Prentiss ponders her future.

includedAssets.title: Season 7
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU continue to take on America’s most chilling and brutal murderers, aided by a shock reunion. Gritty crime drama starring Joe Mantegna, Matthew Gray Gubler, Shemar Moore and Thomas Gibson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU continue to take on America’s most chilling and brutal murderers, aided by a shock reunion. Gritty crime drama starring Joe Mantegna.

includedIn.title: Criminal Minds
includedIn.synopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, a team of elite psychological profilers, travel America aiding local police by getting inside suspects’ heads.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
